name: Demons vs Fairyland HD
description:
Love defending babies with towers? This is the game for you!

Raise undead armies, construct brutally cute towers and summon dark energies to protect your children at all costs. Skills and gears will enhance your powers and structure upgrades with grant special abilities to fight your way back to the dark forest. Those goody two-shoes Fairyland folks aren't going to make it easy...

Features:

PLAY AS THE VILLAIN!
Control your troops: skeletons and monsters.
Use powerful spells: fire, lightning, zombies, sky swords and more!
Don't let the enemies take the kids! Deceive them with a fake kid.
Hours of gameplay!

BECOME STRONGER...
Many skills to upgrade.
Lots of powerful gears to loot.
Over 50 achievements to unlock.
4 difficulty modes. Will you take up the challenge of the insane mode?

CHALLENGE YOUR TACTICAL SKILLS
A game where tower placement really matters. How good a strategist are you?
Several types of towers to handle: support towers, offensive towers and totems.
6 unique tower specializations, 12 tower spells. Many strategic choices are at your disposal.
Mindswitch your enemies to make them fight for you!
